title: The Casual Collection v1.1 (128 games)
description:
The Casual Collection is my mission to create a collection of all the precracked casual games for windows.
After many months of work, using a combination of the AutoIt scripting language, the Smart Install Maker setup program & batch files, I have been able to create powerful installers & uninstallers. Also, I have created a simple program with menus to automate the whole install/uninstall process. This program is located at the root of the folder & when opened, will display for installation only the games you've downloaded. You don't have to use it, but I recommend it.
Each game is comprised of a small installer file & a data file (located at the "Data" folder). You don't have to download the whole torrent if you want a specific game: just download the two files.

Each newer version of the collection will have all of the games from the previous version plus more... Ultimately, I hope I will succeed in adding all of the casual games out there... I have limited upload, so this process has to be done gradually. I will upload the next version once a month unless I'm the only seeder. Those of you who downloaded a previous version, will only have to do a "Force Check" in your torrent software. However, I will replace specific games with better versions when needed, so you will have to re-download them. Note: all the files in v1.0 have been changed in v1.1 (no point of doing a "Force Check").

I accept requests for games to be included in the next version, as long as there is a trial version of them in a big casual games site (Big Fish, iWin, Alawar, Iplay, etc.). I download the trial version, remove the protection & create the installer.

The "Redist" folder contains various packages, which must be installed in order for all the games to work properly, the present ones & the ones in the future.
"Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5" is not needed to be opened if you use Windows 7.
"Microsoft DirectX Runtime 9.0c" must also be installed in Windows 7, although the operating system comes built-in with DirectX 11.
